message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit greedy.  I'm being generous with a 55/45 split considering the time pressure.
I see you think 55-45 is fair, but I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle ground. 58-42 is my new offer.
Time is running out.  I'm holding firm at 52/48. Take it or leave it.
You're holding firm, but I'm still not convinced. I'll come down a bit more, but I expect some movement from you too.
